backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining mod catalog, user profiles, and library management with access control and seeded mod data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping describing implemented features, related components, and test coverage metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Humanâ€‘written summaries of major frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styles using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global theming and TanStack Router routes for core pages with a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Popup prompting new authenticated users to set a display name and saving it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard that blocks access to protected content and prompts for login.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with navigation links, logo, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, main content container, and footer with dynamic year and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModCard.tsx: Displays a mod's name, author, version, description, tags, and includes a save button.
Button to save or remove mods from the user's library with authentication checks and a login prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current user identity, authentication state, and profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching mods, user library, user profile, and performing library/profile mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom styles like arcade glow and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing geode+, its features, disclaimer, and underlying technology using styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable mod catalog with tag filters, a hero section, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ModDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific mod including description, tags, external links, and a save button.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's saved mods with authentication gating, handling empty and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON describing the current geode+ project state, including version info, required images, existing features, and pending feature requests for an iOS app and backend models.
